La formula di Dead by Deaylight è tanto semplice quanto funzionale, il problema sorge negli sviluppatori incapaci di capire dove voglio portare lo stesso gioco. 
La Behaviour non testa il proprio prodotto e per questo vedi sempre nuovi killer completamente inutili , trasformando le partite a rank piu alti nei soliti 3 killer e i soliti player che cercano di vincere la partita nel minor tempo possibile.
è un ottimo gioco peccato per i suoi sviluppatori, ad oggi sinceramente lo sconsiglio per le molteplici ore di gioco che dovreste dedicare per avere tutti i killer e almeno un sopravvissuto con una buona build.
Топище!!!^^

Dead by Daylight - The captivating climax of any horror movie, survive at all costs, and take your limbs with you. The main characters know that they need to run away, return home, save their lives, but the maniac is on their heels, and just like that will not let anyone go. The developers of Behavior Digital Inc created a survival horror game with asymmetric multiplayer. There is no plot at all here, the game is completely with live people. Having played about 450 hours, I would like to personally share my opinion, although there are quite a lot of reviews, everything is clear that the game has to do. It looks like this is my very first review, where I will use profanity, otherwise it’s impossible to do this game.

Four survivors and one maniac. For survivors, the path to freedom is to start 5 generators, after opening the gate, and escape without looking back, or through a special hatch in case only one survivor remains. Generators are in malfunctioning condition, and their repair takes a certain amount of time. The repair process in the game is implemented as follows: you must click on the button at the right time, when misfiring, the progress bar is thrown back, and the maniac finds out the whereabouts of the unfortunate master. Survivors have at their disposal a small skill, when a maniac approaches, players hear the sound of a gradually increasing heartbeat. In this case, there are two ways: either hide (for example, in one of the lockers scattered on the map), or run away. In the second case, I advise you to be more careful, since the chances of falling into one of the maniac's traps are great. A maniac must find survivors and kill everyone, not allowing anyone to escape. The camera is from a third-person survivor, it is very convenient for him to navigate, look around, every corner is visible. It’s much more fun to play for a maniac, it’s not all simple, he has a first-person view, the angle is limited, it’s quite difficult to find survivors, even when pursuing you can lose sight of it out of the blue.

There are three stages: if the maniac hung you on the hook for the first time, you can be saved, the main thing is that the streak of life does not reach the center, then the second stage will go, where you will have to fight the entity that appears on the hook, and there’s also the possibility of you remove from the hook, in the third stage you die and end the match. There is a chance to jump yourself, but this is a chance of 1 or 2% of the force. Each of the survivors and the maniac has a great many perks, offerings, which can be used before the match, so that the chance of success is high. But, here you will never guess which maniac will be waiting for you in the next match, before the start - the survivors see their friends, the maniac sees them all.

The funniest thing is just beginning - each player has a rank that shows how far he went in passing, that is, in descending order, the start is from 20 to 1, the rank is the same for everyone, but this is despite the fact that if you play alone with strangers Anyone can have a rank with their friends. To a greater extent, all the hassle ahead, the brain takes out much more, the people who are sitting are playing with you. Here, too, can be divided into three categories of people: First - your friends with whom you can pull the match together talking on the microphone. The second is Alien people, but, nevertheless, who are trying to play, pass, fight to the end and help you. Third - Ended bastards, sykis, words, geeks, (the list goes on and on) including immediately, your survivors, and the maniac. And why? because you’ll try to play, earn blood points, (which are spent on pumping a character and a maniac in general) but they won’t let you do this, people will either be kidding, showing off, and someone will not even remove you from the hook and will not cure you, when you will be injured. Most of all, it’s a shame, a pity for the maniac himself, so if you decide to play for him and you come across people of the same third category, prepare a series of analgin. You will try your best to kill at least a couple of people, you will meet terrible mockery, before you a person will run just like that, squat multiple times, so that you would be distracted only by him while others will change the generator, and in this game every second counts .

In any case, today Dead by Daylight, thanks to its novelty and thick, depressing atmosphere, is different from many survival games and gives a lot of impressions mixed with adrenaline. But, nevertheless, think about it if you really want to pat your nerves, swear to the fullest, boldly acquire.

Dead by Daylight жонглирует условностями и штампами фильмов-слэшеров, выстраивая на них весь игровой процесс. Классическая ситуация — герой что есть мочи улепетывает от маньяка, тот мрачно шагает следом, но все равно настигает жертву. В Dead by Daylight подобная волнующая сцена есть почти в каждом матче. Неубиваемый (буквально) маньяк всегда чуть быстрее жертв, он умеет читать оставленные ими следы, лучше видит карту и имеет куда больше времени для ее изучения. Беги не беги, а шанс, что убийца внезапно появится из-за угла или схватит за пятки, когда ты в отчаянии лезешь в окно, всегда велик.
